actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that employed individuals over age 65 not be required to contribute to the Federal Insurance Contributions Act.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt employees over age 65 from the requirements of the Federal Insurance Contributions Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that employed individuals over age 65 not be required to contribute to the Federal Insurance Contributions Act.
